data.title: Mission & Purpose Statement
data.meta_description: Mission & Purpose Statement  - Mercy McAuley High School
data.text:
Mission

Mercy McAuley High School is a Catholic college-preparatory high school for young women. It is a sponsored ministry of the Institute of the Sisters of Mercy of the Americas and is a member of Mercy Education. Mercy McAuley is committed to excellence in education, compassionate service and leadership in a Christ-centered community.

Purpose Statement

Igniting the Potential Within
